channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Audio Interfaces of 2025: Universal Audio and More
item.description: We've tested dozens of the most popular USB audio interfaces and found the best sounding and easiest to use in your home studio.

item.title: In Orbit You Have to Slow Down to Speed Up
item.description: Driving a spacecraft around a planet isn’t anything like driving on a planet. A physicist explains orbital navigation.

item.title: Big tech is paying for Trump’s White House ballroom
item.description: Trump's $250 million White House ballroom will be funded in part by big tech companies like Amazon, Apple, Google, Meta, and Microsoft.

item.title: Ford isn’t going to make more F-150 Lightnings for a while
item.description: Ford is prioritizing its gas and hybrid F-150 trucks instead.

item.title: How Data Centers Actually Work
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we discuss the economics and environmental impacts of energy-hungry data centers and whether these facilities are s...

item.title: Best Bike Lights, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Just like motorists, cyclists are also required to use lights after dark. See and be seen with our best bike light sets.

item.title: With an Intel recovery underway, all eyes turn to its foundry business
item.description: Intel added $20 billion to its balance sheet in Q3 but didn't offer many details on the progress of its floundering foundry business.

item.title: Meet the Palestinian Teens Trying to Win Robotics Gold
item.description: Next week, five teens from Palestine will head to Panama to compete in one of the world’s largest youth robotics competitions. The goal? To win—and th...

item.title: Trump credits Benioff, Huang for decision not to ‘surge’ Fed troops into San Francisco
item.description: Trump said he scrapped plans to send the National Guard into San Francisco after calls from Nvidia’s Jensen Huang and Salesforce’s Marc Benioff. Mayor...

item.title: OpenAI buys Sky, an AI interface for Mac
item.description: OpenAI has acquired Software Applications, Inc., the startup behind Sky — an AI-powered natural language interface for Mac that can view your screen a...
